body:
Fixes: https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/9083

The linked issue contains examples where Spack's parsing of `module show` produces incorrect results. This makes the following changes:

* Updates the pattern searching for several paths to avoid the case where they are prefixes of unwanted paths
* Adds a warning message when an extracted path doesn't exist (which may help catch future module parsing bugs faster)
* Adds a test with the content mentioned in #9083
title: Bug fix: module file path parsing
